item.title: Forest Garden Design Workshop April 2020
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Today’s livestream workshop on Forest Garden Design seemed to go okay. I kind of miss people; next week I’ll be chatting with Martin Hayes, Orchardist to the stars, which will be fun.

item.title: Overview of my forest garden design process
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: I’ve been asking friends and colleagues for feedback about what would make a good online course for forest gardening.

item.title: The joy of forest garden planning
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Things have started happening in the Ornamental Forest Garden—we have the beginnings of a Northern Hedge, the plants from ScotPlants Direct are arriving tomorrow, and the digger cometh.

item.title: Now offering remote forest garden design service!
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: “I’m just delighted with the plan! It’s everything I wanted and much more.

item.title: My first ever paid forest garden design job
item.author: hello@growdigital.org (Jake Rayson)
item.description: I’m proud to have finished my first paid forest garden design. It was a remote job, which I chanced upon via Facebook.
